abstract: Musangwe, form of bare-knuckle boxing, is nearly 200-year-old tradition among members of South Africa's Venda tribe.

headline.main: Musangwe Fight Club: A Vicious Venda Tradition

snippet: No gloves, no headgear, no time limits. Only when one fighter submits can the fight can come to an end. Also, no gambling. Just fighting.
lead_paragraph: No gloves, no headgear, no time limits. Only when one fighter submits can the fight can come to an end. Also, no gambling. Just fighting.
